map.name: Iris DTC
map.objective: Leak the lava contained inside the opposing teams core to the void

rules.rule: Don't Carpet Bomb. Carpet bomb is defined as dropping TNT on enemy players/structures from a high enough location as to put you at little risk to enemy arrow fire originating from the ground. The recommended acceptable height is 5 blocks above any enemy structures.

Spawn killing is only acceptable if a team mate is simultaneously breaking the core with a diamond pickaxe (unless they are unavailable), spawn killing must stop within a minute of any core breaking activity ceasing.
